TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StrokeCollectionChangedEventHandler(object sender, StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StrokeCollectionChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
